p: E = Experiment; C = Catalyst; FS = Fatty source; A = Alcohol; CR = Conversion rate (% área); P24S = poly(2,4-dihydroxy-5-sulfo-benzoic acid); POS = poly(2-hydroxy-5-sulfo-benzoic acid); PPS = poly(4-hydroxy-5-sulfo-benzoic); TS = Tallow swine; SO = Used sauteing oil; MeOH = Methanol; EtOH = Ethanol.
